name: frisk

effect.x-y: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.

short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

flavor_text.x-y: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
